query: Recommend to user 29 some movies popular among kids.

tool_plan.note: To get the IDs of movies popular among kids.
To get a personalized ranking of movies popular among kids for the user.
To get useful information to list the recommended items. 'title', 'genres', and 'description' should be retrieved.

arguments.items: <Python list containing the IDs of movies returned by the get_popular_items_tool>
<Python list of item IDs returned by get_top_k_recommendations_tool>
